MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9pm to carry out repair work on damaged equipment on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:12pm on 16th February 2021.
